title: Machine Made Tape For Tape Lace, early 20th century
medium: Technique: This tape with a gauze-cross edge was woven by the yard to make lace.
dimensions: Cardboard size: 21 cm [8.25"] x 9 cm [3.5"] Width of tape: .8 cm [.25"]
description: Woven tape used to make lace that has been wound around a piece of cardboard with a blue edge top and bottom.

type.name: Machine made tape for tape lace

tombstone.epitaph:
Machine Made Tape For Tape Lace, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Technique: This tape with a gauze-cross edge was woven by the yard to make lace.. Gift of Kristina T. Ells. 1995-54-1.
